features: NO NEED FOR SHAVING CREAM or SHAVING GEL — Lather and shave in one easy step with the Schick Intuition Sensitive Care Refills
MOISTURIZING BAR WITH ALOE — Built-in moisturizing bar with organic aloe helps soften skin as you shave
DERMATOLOGIST TESTED — Vegan, hypoallergenic formula is dermatologist tested, gentle and great for sensitive skin
CLOSE, SMOOTH SHAVE — 4 blades and pivoting head that hugs the contours of your body
PERFECT FOR FIRST-TIME SHAVERS — Minimizes nicks and cuts
Intuition Sensitive Care Refills fit any Intuition handle
body.description: The 6-count Schick Intuition Sensitive Care Razor refill pack includes 6 razor blade cartridges that can fit any Intuition handle. Schick Intuition Sensitive Care women’s razor refills lather and shave in one easy step, with no need for shave gel! Our sensitive skin razor refills are made with natural fragrances and organic aloe. The gentle Sensitive Care formula is dermatologist tested, vegan and hypoallergenic, making it great for sensitive skin. Each smooth-gliding 4-blade cartridge has a pivoting head to hug the contours of your legs and body. Plus, Schick Intuition Razor refills are perfect for first-time shavers, minimizing nicks and cuts.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 4 Blades Schick Intuition 4-blade refills fit all Intuition razors. Now with moisturizing ribbons, this refill is infused with aloe and vitamin E. Schick Intuition Naturals Sensitive Care Refills Now available with visible ribbons of moisture within the Skin Conditioning Solid Schick Intuition, the only razor that lathers and shaves in one easy step, is bringing a unique twist to your favorite shower accessory with Schick Intuition with Moisturizing Ribbons. The unique 2-in-1 razor now features visible ribbons of moisture within the Skin Conditioning Solid. This essential multi-tasking beauty accessory for women delivers the simplest way to smooth skin. Schick Intuition Naturals Sensitive Care refills are hypoallergenic, containing natural aloe and vitamin E, and moisturize during shaving.

Product features include: A Unique Skin Conditioning Solid that creates its own light lather when wet, melting just enough to smooth the razor’s path and leave you with noticeably soft skin after every shave Four Blades that allow for a precise shave A Pivoting Head that follows the contours of a woman’s body to help minimize nicks and cuts

Lather and Shave in One Easy Step Schick Intuition razors allow you to lather and shave in one easy step. When you start shaving, the skin moisturizing solid reacts with water and melts just enough to create a light foam. Without the need for a separate shave gel, soap, or body wash, you'll save time while simultaneously moisturizing during shaving. Moisturizing Solid with Aloe and Vitamin E Schick Intuition Naturals Sensitive Care refills are hypoallergenic, containing natural aloe and vitamin E, and moisturize during shaving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly suitable for sensitive and dry skin!
reviews.reviewText: The shave I get with this product is unbelievable. I have struggled with razor burn via other shaving products, but this is the true winner! It is awesome to have the shaving soap right along with the razor. Such little hassle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wife loves them!
reviews.reviewText: Always a great little side gift of stocking stuffer these. She's used these for years and pleased with the quality and value of these blades with the razor. They come with various scents and gives some variety year round. Good value pack offerings for a decent price through Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite! Love the new handle
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used Intuition razors for decades now, I think. I go back and forth between those and men’s razors, but I’m always happy with my shave when I use these blades. The new handle on this one is EVERYTHING! No more bulk, easier to hold, easier to control.I’m 41 now and my skin is way more sensitive than it was in my 20s. I have really coarse hair, too, which is why men’s blades seem to work well for me. These leave my skin super soft and I NEVER get razor burn, scrapes, cuts, etc. Not even along my bikini line! And let’s face it: I’m lazy. 90% of the time I just shave wet or with soap, no shaving cream. This solves that and makes my lazy life easier!I highly recommend the new handle!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works as promised in Florida!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this brand.
reviews.reviewText: I can zip through shaving my legs and NEVER get a nick.Blades lasts longer than the lubricant strip, so I supplement on the last shave or two.Quite expensive, but to me, worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars More expensive than others, but works great
reviews.reviewText: My sister and niece gave me one when I was visiting them. I was skeptical but I'm reordering refills for the 3rd time. They are more expensive, but give an excellent shave!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hairy legs keeping you from Olympic level swimming speeds? Not anymore!
reviews.reviewText: Preface: Before we begin this review, what you need to know about me is that I’m right hand dominant. Honestly, you probably could have figured that via the context clues, without me laying it out for you, but just in case, I’m letting you know. I want you to get all you can from this review. Additionally, this review is aimed primarily at sensitive skinned shavers, but does not disclude non-sensitive skinned shavers. Or left-hand dominant shavers. This is an includive review. Ok? Ok. Lets do this.Did you know shaving doesnt have to be painful? Did you know it is possible to shave your legs without looking like you drop kicked a series of glass windows and tables? Did you know its possible to shave your legs, and not have them feel burny and itchy afterward, as if you are wearing pants made of hot fiberglass insulation? I didn’t, but it’s true!I tried everything: Venus (trash), Flamingo (garbage), dollar shave club (trash, but better trash, like trash from a wealthy neighborhood), nair (stinky, messy), an electric shaver (fun, but crap), the weird block thing with the special glass (dont even THINK about doing your knees). It all was flaming hot garbage.With other razors, I had to be so slow and gentle, like when you’ve run out of good options in jenga, and you have to pull a block leaving the whole wobbly tower to balance on that one hero of a center block. And one wrong move could end in disaster. I felt like the dude in the movie who has to cut the right wire. Its exhausting! Even if you do everything “right” you could still end up with angry, bloody, bumpy skin. And I did! But that life is in the past for me now!With the Schick Intuition (the fork in an apple razor), I don’t have Harvey Dent legs… you know what I do have? Nice Beluga Whale skin legs. Sleek, smooth, improved agility in water due to reduced drag forces. And I DONT have to be careful and concentrated when shaving anymore! I could shave my legs in the dark, drunk, with my left hand and not need a single bandaid! Just aerodynamic as heck with my smooth-a legs.So get the Schick intuition razor. Get the one with the sleek handle (because the chunky handle looks like a 2 hander), and enjoy your new beluga legs!*also, it feels appropriate to say: no one, including Schick, is paying me for this or giving me free stuff. And if they read this I doubt they would ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, no razor burn!!
reviews.reviewText: Every razor I've ever used has given me horrible razor burn on my bikini area, and this is the first razor I've used that did not cause that. I'll never use anything else from now on.

reviews.reviewTitle: Una buena opción para quienes tenemos piel sensible
reviews.reviewText: La uso hace varios años y la recomiendo a mis amigas. Quienes la compraron, la siguen usando. Estaba buscando los repuestos porque en el súper estaban caros. Aproveche la oferta y si me convino.

Item was delivered in perfect shape of the shipping envelope. Once opened I noticed the Schick carton was ripped open and one cartridge was missing. So instead of 6 I only had 5 cartridges in the box. Very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 19, 2015

reviews.reviewTitle: Navajas que son efectivas pero humectan la piel
reviews.reviewText: De las mejores cosas que he comprado, cuidan la piel y la dejan humectada
